# Light of Mercuria (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Good Spells|good]], [[Light Spells|light]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 4]], [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Target and Effect:** You and up to two rays; see text

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level (D) or until discharged; see text

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes; see text

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 132

This spell functions like *[[Light of Lunia (Spell)|light of Lunia]],* except that the radiance created is golden. Your light rays deal 2d6 points of damage, or 4d6 points of damage against undead and evil outsiders.
